basics.name: Sopheak Chim
basics.label: Aspiring Engineer
basics.summary: Developer with a strong foundation in scripting, automation, and diagnostics. Experienced in Linux environments, MERN stack development, and project-based collaboration. Seeking SWE/SDE roles that combine hands-on technical skills with a strong focus on design, user experience, and test-driven development.

work.name: Walmart
work.summary: Delivered customer support on electronics products and resolved technical issues through first-line troubleshooting.

work.name: Silvus Technologies
work.summary: Automation scripts and performing diagnostics for QA.
highlights: Troubleshot hardware/software edge cases by parsing test logs, using Linux CLI tools to distinguish between script errors and firmware/radio malfunctions.
Supported internal CRM systems and QA processes by maintaining traceable logs, summaries, and device testing status.
Collaborated cross-functionally with Engineering and QC for root cause analysis and early-stage test coverage improvement.

projects.name: Real-Time MERN Chat App | Chamo
projects.summary: Built and deployed a complete chat system using the MERN stack and Socket.io for live messaging. Collaborated in an Agile team using Figma for UI design and peer code reviews for QA.
highlights: Created modular API routes with Express
Built dynamic frontend using React and DaisyUI

projects.name: AI Desktop Mock Interviwer
projects.summary: Built an Electron-based voice assistant overlay tool for personal productivity and LLM interaction. Integrated Whisper for speech-to-text, System Prompt Engineering, DeepSeek API for contextual LLM responses, and Kkokoro TTS for audio output.
highlights: Designed a transparent floating chat overlay for passive multitasking
System prompt engineering for tailoring LLM responses
Added clipboard access and passive screen overlay chat

projects.name: Weather-Based Outfit Color Recommender
projects.summary: Pulled live weather data using WeatherAPI mapped conditions to warm/cool color palettes, and generated matching tones using a colour-combination-dictionary. Rendered suggestions dynamically based on real-time temperature analysis.
highlights: Built with custom UI components using React and TailwindCSS
